experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
experience.description: Collaborated on the migration of legacy monolithic services to a microservices architecture using Node.js and Docker. Optimized database queries in PostgreSQL, reducing latency by 20%. Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and automated CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Assisted in the development of RESTful APIs using Python and Flask. Wrote comprehensive unit tests to increase code coverage by 15% and participated in daily agile stand-ups to streamline feature delivery.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
